    C

    continueGame() - Method in class dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.TicTacToe
    Continues the game after its state has been restored by TicTacToe.restoreState(String).
    createComputerPlayer(TicTacToe) - Static method in class dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.TicTacToe
    Creates a new player that represents the computer and can only be used in a person-vs-computer game.
    createHumanPlayer(TicTacToe) - Static method in class dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.TicTacToe
    Creates a new player that represents a human being and can be used in a person-vs-computer or person-vs-person game.
    createNewClassicGame() - Static method in class dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.TicTacToe
    Creates a new Tic-Tac-Toe grid with size 3x3.

    D

    dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe - package dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe
    Contains the TicTacToe class and the Player interface.
    dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.cli - package dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.cli
    Contains a demo application that shows how to use the TicTacToe class.

    G

    getCurrentPlayer() - Method in class dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.TicTacToe
    Returns the name of the player whose turn it is to mark a spot on the grid.
    getFirstPlayer() - Method in class dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.TicTacToe
    Returns the name of the player who made the first move in this game.
    getGrid() - Method in class dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.TicTacToe
    Returns a square grid showing the current state of the game.
    getMark() - Method in interface dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.Player
    Returns the mark that will be used on the board for this player.
    getMarkAt(int, int) - Method in class dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.TicTacToe
    Returns the mark at the given row and column in the grid.
    getPlayerName() - Method in interface dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.Player
    Returns the player's name.
    getState() - Method in class dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.TicTacToe
    Returns a string representation of the current state of this game.
    getWinner() - Method in class dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.TicTacToe
    Returns the player who won the game.

    I

    isGameOver() - Method in class dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.TicTacToe
    Returns true if a player won or the game ended in a tie.
    isTie() - Method in class dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.TicTacToe
    Returns true if players cannot make any more moves and there is no winner.

    M

    main(String...) - Static method in class dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.cli.TicTacToeCli
    Starts the demo application.
    mark(int, int) - Method in class dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.TicTacToe
    Marks a spot on the grid at the given row and column.

    P

    Player - Interface in dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe
    This interface represents a kind of player who can play a game of Tic-Tac-Toe.

    R

    restoreState(String) - Method in class dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.TicTacToe
    Restores a game to the given saved state.

    S

    setMark(String) - Method in interface dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.Player
    Sets the mark that will be used on the board for this player.
    setPlayerName(String) - Method in interface dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.Player
    Sets the player's name.
    setPlayers(Player, Player) - Method in class dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.TicTacToe
    Sets the two players who will be playing this game.

    T

    tictactoe - module tictactoe
    This module contains the TicTacToe class, which is used to create a new square grid, create players, and mark a spot on the grid for a player.
    TicTacToe - Class in dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe
    This class is responsible for creating a new Tic-Tac-Toe grid, creating players for the game, and marking spots on the grid for both players.
    TicTacToeCli - Class in dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.cli
    The main entry point for the demo application.
    TicTacToeCliTwoPlayers - Class in dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.cli
    This class demos how to set up a game in which a player plays against another player.
    TicTacToeCliVersusComputer - Class in dev.bjdelacruz.tictactoe.cli
    This class demos how to set up a game in which a player plays against the computer.
